RAR_over_DVB_stream_descriptor.download_start_time: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss, optional group with download_period_duration and download_cycle_time
RAR_over_DVB_stream_descriptor.download_period_duration: uint8, optional group with download_start_time and download_cycle_time
RAR_over_DVB_stream_descriptor.download_cycle_time: uint8, optional group with download_start_time and download_period_duration
